content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1) and a furnace at position(y1)

### Iron plate factory at position(z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position y1 to the assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough iron plates in your inventory before attempting to craft items that require them. Check the required amounts for each recipe.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the intended location.
